item.title: PHP Long String?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

How would I make a long string in php. I’m trying to fix up my hiscores, http://sagescape.zapto.org. The thing is that I made it order by overall level then exp, but when the number is bigger than 2147m it goes into the negatives. So, I did this: function dots($num) { if ($num < 0) { return number_format(2147483647); } if($num) { $num = number_format($num); } else { $num = "0"; } return $num; }
The thing is that it shows as 2147m, but reads it as the negative. So, it makes i in a different position. Like “Psyho” should be #1, but “A” is number 1, he has less exp. Any fix?
